text: A go-kart, also written as go-cart (sometimes known as kart), is a type of small sports car, close wheeled car, open-wheel car or quadracycle. Go-karts come in all shapes and forms. Karting is a type of racing in which a four- wheel car called a go-kart is used. Art Ingels created the first go-kart in Los Angeles in 1956. ==Related pages== * Kart racing ==References== Category:Auto racing
title: Go-kart
